effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 894 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 894 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
